data.title: South Waterfront Campus
data.meta_description: Information about OHSU's South Waterfront Central District, including parking and driving directions to Center for Health and Healing and the OHSU Collaborative Life Sciences Building.
data.text:
From the North via I-405

Follow signs for I-405 (Salem/The Dalles)

Take Exit 1C (S. 6th Avenue)

Stay left; follow signs for 6th Avenue/City Center/Auditorium

Left onto S. 6th Avenue

Right onto S.W. Harrison Street

Cross over S. Naito Parkway

Right onto S. Moody Avenue

From the North or Northeast via I-5

Stay in far right lane over the Marquam Bridge

Exit on 299A to 43/Lake Oswego/ Macadam; stay in middle lane

Follow signs to “South Waterfront;" Stay left on curve to left

At light, turn left onto S. Macadam Avenue

Right onto S. Curry Avenue

From the West via Highway 26

Stay in center lane through Vista Tunnel

Exit at S. Market Street; stay on S. Market Street

Cross over S. Naito Parkway onto S. Harbor Drive

At 2nd light, turn left onto S.W. Harrison Street

Right onto S. Moody Avenue

From downtown Portland

Proceed south, then left onto S.W. Harrison Street

Cross over S. Naito Parkway

Right onto S. Moody Avenue

From Marquam Hill

From S.W. Campus Drive, turn left onto S. Terwilliger Boulevard

Or, from Sam Jackson Park Road, continue on Terwilliger Boulevard

Right to stay on S. Terwilliger Boulevard; it becomes S. 6th Avenue

Right onto S.W. Harrison; it becomes S. River Parkway

Right on S. Moody Avenue

From the South via S. Barbur Boulevard

Travel north on S. Barbur Boulevard

Exit onto S. Naito Parkway

Right onto S.W. Harrison Street

Right onto S. Moody Avenue

From the South via I-5

Take exit 299B, left side (“City Center/S Waterfront”)

Bear left (“City Center/S Waterfront”) as exit splits

Right onto S. River Parkway (first traffic signal)

Right onto S. Moody Avenue

From the South via S. Macadam or Sellwood Bridge

Travel north on S. Macadam Avenue

Right onto S. Curry Avenue
